verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, Altaschith <WH516> <WH8686>, Michtam <WH4387> of David <WH1732>; when Saul <WH7586> sent <WH7971> <WH8800>, and they watched <WH8104> <WH8799> the house <WH1004> to kill him <WH4191> <WH8687>. Deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> me from mine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>, O my 'Elohim <WH430>: defend <WH7682> <WH8762> me from them that rise up <WH6965> <WH8693> against me.
Deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> me from the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205>, and save <WH3467> <WH8685> me from bloody <WH1818> men <WH582>.

For, lo, they lie in wait <WH693> <WH8804> for my soul <WH5315>: the mighty <WH5794> are gathered <WH1481> <WH8799> against me; not for my transgression <WH6588>, nor for my sin <WH2403>, O YY <WH3068>.
They run <WH7323> <WH8799> and prepare <WH3559> <WH8709> themselves without my fault <WH5771>: awake <WH5782> <WH8798> to help <WH7125> <WH8800> me, and behold <WH7200> <WH8798>.

Thou therefore, O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> TZva'ot <WH6635>, the 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, awake <WH6974> <WH8685> to visit <WH6485> <WH8800> all the heathen <WH1471>: be not merciful <WH2603> <WH8799> to any wicked <WH205> transgressors <WH898> <WH8802>. Selah <WH5542>.
They return <WH7725> <WH8799> at evening <WH6153>: they make a noise <WH1993> <WH8799> like a dog <WH3611>, and go round about <WH5437> <WH8779> the city <WH5892>.
Behold, they belch out <WH5042> <WH8686> with their mouth <WH6310>: swords <WH2719> are in their lips <WH8193>: for who, say they, doth hear <WH8085> <WH8802> ?
But thou, O YY <WH3068>, shalt laugh <WH7832> <WH8799> at them; thou shalt have all the heathen <WH1471> in derision <WH3932> <WH8799>.
Because of his strength <WH5797> will I wait <WH8104> <WH8799> upon thee: for 'Elohim <WH430> is my defence <WH4869>.
The 'Elohim <WH430> of my mercy <WH2617> shall prevent <WH6923> <WH8762> me: 'Elohim <WH430> shall let me see <WH7200> <WH8686> my desire upon mine enemies <WH8324> <WH8802>.

Slay <WH2026> <WH8799> them not, lest my people <WH5971> forget <WH7911> <WH8799>: scatter <WH5128> <WH8685> them by thy power <WH2428>; and bring them down <WH3381> <WH8685>, O YY <WH136> our shield <WH4043>.

For the sin <WH2403> of their mouth <WH6310> and the words <WH1697> of their lips <WH8193> let them even be taken <WH3920> <WH8735> in their pride <WH1347>: and for cursing <WH423> and lying <WH3585> which they speak <WH5608> <WH8762>.

Consume <WH3615> <WH8761> them in wrath <WH2534>, consume <WH3615> <WH8761> them, that they may not be: and let them know <WH3045> <WH8799> that 'Elohim <WH430> ruleth <WH4910> <WH8802> in Ya`akov <WH3290> unto the ends <WH657> of the earth <WH776>. Selah <WH5542>.
And at evening <WH6153> let them return <WH7725> <WH8799>; and let them make a noise <WH1993> <WH8799> like a dog <WH3611>, and go round about <WH5437> <WH8779> the city <WH5892>.
Let them wander up and down <WH5128> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH5128> <WH8799> for meat <WH398> <WH8800>, and grudge <WH3885> <WH8799> if they be not satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799>.

But I will sing <WH7891> <WH8799> of thy power <WH5797>; yea, I will sing aloud <WH7442> <WH8762> of thy mercy <WH2617> in the morning <WH1242>: for thou hast been my defence <WH4869> and refuge <WH4498> in the day <WH3117> of my trouble <WH6862>.
Unto thee, O my strength <WH5797>, will I sing <WH2167> <WH8762>: for 'Elohim <WH430> is my defence <WH4869>, and the 'Elohim <WH430> of my mercy <WH2617>.
